dmca.title: [AB-C22478S] ISP Letter: Online-savings.2xrv.com/Sony Camcorder

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]

Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [AB-C22478S] ISP Letter: Online-savings.2xrv.com/Sony Camcorder
Subject: [AB-C22478S] ISP Letter: Online-savings.2xrv.com/Sony Camcorder


Reference: [AB-C22478S]

copyright@theplanet.com is the clearinghouse for all copyright infringement reports.
Your email is being sent to our legal counsel at the address copyright@theplanet.com
for consideration. You may find their direct contact information at this URL:
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/
--
Thank you, 

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

envelope-from=jill@netenforcers.com; helo=ms17.mse9.exchange.ms; 

 (multipart/related)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
The below is a Cease and Desist letter referencing your client
Online-savings.2xrv.com and our client Sony with specific respects to Camcorder.
Your client continues the use the copyrighted images/text and/or trademarked logos
of Sony Camcorder. The notice was originally sent to your client on 06/09/06. As of
this time the website was rechecked and the infringing material has not been removed
in its entirety. We are informing you in an attempt to get this resolved. Please
assist us in having this material removed from your clients' website.  
________________________________ 
 
Phoenix Office: 
 
 
Ellis & Venable 
 
 
101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875 
 
 
Phoenix, Arizona 85003 
 
voice: (602) 631-9393 
 
fax: (602) 631-9796 
 
  
 
6/22/2006 
 
  
 
  
 
 
7005 3110 0000 6653 8203 
 
 
  
 
VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL 
 
RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED 
 
  
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
 
George Poletes 
 
1333 Stemmons Pwy., Ste. 110, 
 
Dallas,TX.75207 
 
  
 
Re:       Unauthorized Use of Sony'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials 
 
  
 
Dear Designated Agent: 
 
  
 
We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you with
respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials.   
 
  
 
Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its
rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials.
 Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17
U.S.C. § 512 (c)(3)(A) and 15 U.S.C. § 1125(a) and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify
you of Sony's good faith belief that your client, online-savings.2xrv.com, at the
URL www.online-savings.2xrv.com, is using Sony trademarks and/or copyrighted
materials without authorization by Sony, its agents, or the law, specifically with
respect to camcorder products sold by Sony's Personal Mobile Imaging Division. Sony
has a good faith belief that the information contained in this letter is accurate,
and under penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Sony. 
 
  
 
            The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes to be
infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing
Material") are copyrighted images from Sony's website.  Specific
violations of copyrighted images by online-savings.2xrv.com are listed
below this paragraph. 
 
  
 
http://online-savings.2xrv.com/photo/172421.html 
 
http://online-savings.2xrv.com/item/B000E0DU7G.html 
 
http://online-savings.2xrv.com/item/B0007M3PJO.html 
 
http://online-savings.2xrv.com/item/B000E0G014.html 
 
http://online-savings.2xrv.com/item/B0007M3PKI.html 
 
  
 
            Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(1)(C),
Sony hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing
Material in an expeditious manner.   
 
  
 
  
 
If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department
via facsimile to 501-646-6242, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communications should be in writing. 
However, if you wish to speak with Net Enforcers directly, you may contact them at
501-646-6242.  Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this matter
with you.  Please do not contact Sony directly, as Sony will simply refer the matter
back to Net Enforcers.  If your designated agent or representation does not respond
to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 7/4/2006, we will assume that this
demand has been rejected and proceed accordingly. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Ellis & Venable 
 
  
 
Lance C. Venable 
 
Attorney at Law 
 
  
 
LCV/roc
